game.name: Swift Ninja
game.description:
Ninji is known for his swift moves and excellent control over the handling of multiple weapons. Today we have brought to you a latest adventure challenge where your favorite ninja only survives if you put your swift and quick reflexes to test. Are you ready enough to react as a swift warrior? Join Swift Ninja and be prepared to help your favorite character complete his most awaited mission! Your goal in this exciting and challenging platform style game is to run, jump and fire up various obstacles. 

The primary purpose of all the obstacles that you see on the way is to stop you from moving forward and restrict you from completing your exclusive adventure. Wining this cool html5 adventure game is not going to be easy at all as a dangerous boss is waiting for you at the end of portal. You would meet plenty of elements over there, including Air, Water, Fire and Earth. The good news is that you would also get a chance to grab gold and purchase some exclusive weapons and ninjas. 

Kill all your enemies you see on the road to collect gold from them and avoid all obstacles to become a champion of a ninja running game! Be careful all the time and try to run as fast as possible to cover maximum distance over the platform! Good luck to go as far as you can in our endless runner kids game! All the best to have a blast in our all skill based highscore games! It is our pleasure to serve you with the best entertainment and thrill at no cost, no download required.
